Supply Agreement.pdf: Tesla, Inc. and Panasonic Energy Co., Ltd.
EX-10.2.html: Tesla, Inc. and LG Energy Solution

Supply Agreement.pdf: 5 years from the Effective Date, with automatic renewal for successive 1-year periods
EX-10.2.html: 3 years with option to extend for 2 additional years

Supply Agreement.pdf: Binding arbitration under the rules of the American Arbitration Association
EX-10.2.html: Mediation followed by binding arbitration in New York
tsla-ex102_486.htm.pdf: Exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Travis County, Texas

EX-10.2.html: Limited to total fees paid in the preceding 12 months

Supply Agreement.pdf: Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice; immediate termination for material breach
EX-10.2.html: 60 days written notice; 30-day cure period for breach

Supply Agreement.pdf: Each party retains ownership of its pre-existing IP; joint IP developed under the agreement shall be jointly owned
EX-10.2.html: All IP developed under this agreement shall be owned by Tesla
tsla-ex102_486.htm.pdf: Background IP retained; foreground IP licensed to Tesla exclusively
